data.message: Can you change the color of facebook to other color not just blue and also Facebook you should better add new other emojis for us to choose to!

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestions, Maria. We're listening to all the feedback we receive from our community and use it to inform our decisions. If you have any additional suggestions you'd like to share, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Sidney
and also thank you Facebook! For being a part of my life 😄 I really enjoyed it! Being able to connect to my friends around the world 😃 thank you so much! 👍
